MPM.content: ”yes” commits w/ no content must repeat itself: yes yes, must bind itself to memory for memory, if anything’s to come from future [alliance btwn memory and seal of yes, yes]

ATIA.content: for Aristotle, sleep is a desmos, a peculiar way which aisthēsis is bound, Heidegger’s binding “ring” of the animal, animal more tightly bound than man
ATIA.linkedContent: for Aristotle, sleep is a desmos, a peculiar way which aisthēsis is bound, Heidegger’s binding “ring” of the animal, animal more tightly bound than man

SH.content: meridian binds (“das Verbindende,” both binds and connects), provokes, at noon, the encounter [shortest shadow], example of law > “a date would be the gnomon [nom, shadow, not mine] of these meridians”
SH.linkedContent: meridian binds (“das Verbindende,” both binds and connects), provokes, at noon, the encounter [shortest shadow], example of law > “a date would be the gnomon [nom, shadow, not mine] of these meridians”

P.content: reserve, savings, stock: self-protection of the work (ergon), binding (Verbindung) of energy, condition for “mastery” of pleasure-principle
P.linkedContent: reserve, savings, stock: self-protection of the work (ergon), binding (Verbindung) of energy, condition for “mastery” of pleasure-principle

ROP.content: repetition compulsion (advocatus diaboli of death drive) as resource & limit (à la fois) of psychoanalysis > analytic position set going endlessly, w/out Aufhebung, in paradox of Bindung and Erlöschung (solution, extinction): no analytic position when resistance is unidentifiable

ROP.content: possibility of unbinding condition of possibility for binding in general [not dialectical]
ROP.linkedContent: possibility of unbinding condition of possibility for binding in general [not dialectical]

OTO.content: Nietzsche exposes “academic freedom,” autonomous university, as ruse of State, a constraint more ferocious for disguising itself as laisser-faire [Hegel is accused here, too]

DPi.content: bandalettes (bandages) on body signify death, condemnation of death, and when untied they signal that dead has risen, resuscitated, insurrectioned, insuressuscité
DPi.linkedContent: bandalettes (bandages) on body signify death, condemnation of death, and when untied they signal that dead has risen, resuscitated, insurrectioned, insuressuscité

DPi.content: time of bandages: when body not found—when Jesus is not dead but not yet elevated, resuscitated > the lodging made ready for literature: ascension w/out ascension, elevation w/out elevation, immanence w/out immanence, imminent yet unaccomplished resurrection
DPi.linkedContent: time of bandages: when body not found—when Jesus is not dead but not yet elevated, resuscitated > the lodging made ready for literature: ascension w/out ascension, elevation w/out elevation, immanence w/out immanence, imminent yet unaccomplished resurrection

DPi.content: moment before noli me tangere [p. 35n unique moment, since Jesus is generally a touching Jesus], moment where mourning can’t set to work, there’s no corpse > when Mary and Antigone weep over absence of burial
DPi.linkedContent: moment before noli me tangere [p. 35n unique moment, since Jesus is generally a touching Jesus], moment where mourning can’t set to work, there’s no corpse > when Mary and Antigone weep over absence of burial

DPi.content: instant of bandages, Christ’s being-there w/out being-there: this Dasein that is not a Da-sein, this Fort/Da-sein of Christ who’s dead but not dead, mort vivant
DPi.linkedContent: instant of bandages, Christ’s being-there w/out being-there: this Dasein that is not a Da-sein, this Fort/Da-sein of Christ who’s dead but not dead, mort vivant

DPi.content: theater of cruelty, scopic drive, fascinatio, enchantment that chains spectator to spectacle (fascio, to tense, tie, attach, fasciola is a bandage wrapping [bandelette]) > what links voyeur-spectator to fascinum, charm, enchantment, virile sex

DPi.content: to executioner: “so, you got a hard-on! (tu bandes!)” (link to erection at moment of decapitation)

C.content: theory of coffins, series w/out model, w/out example (procession in double band fascinates, can’t see there’s no example) > obsequence of this cortege in singular lineage

SPEC.content: what binds (lie) game to itself is re- of return, the returned or the returning (le revenu ou le revenant), revenance orders entire teleology, can be handed over to PP

SPEC.content: exemplary narcissistic wound [for Freud]: jealousy over birth of new baby, proof of infidelity of object of child's affection, undoes (défait) the bind (lien) (Bindung) to parent of opposite sex

SPEC.content: bind always serves PP, to understand one must hear several voices, speak several languages, & count w/ several generations of computers

SPEC.content: neither permanent traces nor resistance in [Freud’s] Perception-Consciousness (free circulation of energy w/out obstacle or binding), permanent trace supposes frayage (Bahnung) and an overcome resistance

FV.content: [proper] address of letter: law that binds King & Queen
there are only ostriches, the more one presents one’s rear, the more one is master: can’t avoid being plucked (laisser plumer)
